intro: Palicourea roseiflora, commonly known as the pink-flowered palicourea, is a flowering plant belonging to the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its striking pink to purple flowers, which are typically clustered in inflorescences. Its leaves are usually opposite and have a glossy, dark green appearance. Palicourea roseiflora is often found in moist, shaded habitats such as rainforests and undergrowth.
